plot: What happens when Hip-Hop and Japanese culture collide? This film recounts the explosion of hip-hop in Japan and how the intersection of old and new has given rise to new forms of self-expression.
title: Remixed in Japan
plot_es: What happens when Hip-Hop and Japanese culture collide? This film recounts the explosion of hip-hop in Japan and how the intersection of old and new has given rise to new forms of self-expression.
plot_en: What happens when Hip-Hop and Japanese culture collide? This film recounts the explosion of hip-hop in Japan and how the intersection of old and new has given rise to new forms of self-expression.
